Blog.post: I'm going tonight! Can't wait. I will post a review of the movie after I see it. I'm hoping it's another Xmen 2 and tops the first on all levels.
urlLink Mozilla releases web browser updates - ja.zz Everyone should be using Firefox for their main web browser these days. IE is just too insecure and you are just asking for spyware.
urlLink I don't need to explain this one to fans. :) urlLink

urlLink Haha

I admit it. There are millions of blogs out there. Hell I am sure there are hundreds of them that cover just about the same thing I am going to. So why bother? Well I guess I just wanted a place to toss all my random thoughts on stuff that interests me. You are going to see a lot of urlLink Firefly stuff on here, no lie. What you are also going to see are my thoughts on all things Buffyverse, comics, movies, and TV. I will make no bones about it. I am sure at the end of the day I will be lucky to attract one or two "followers," but it does not hurt to try. -J

Ever have one of those nights where u can't sleep? Thought it would be a good time to throw up some real content on this blog. Here are the best three Firefly websites I have found: urlLink Fireflyfans.net urlLink Serenitymovie.net urlLink Official Serenity Website Enjoy!
